name: rustup-reminder
description: RustUp Reminder: Reminds you when a new stable version of Rust is out

rustup-reminder.NotifyWhenUpToDate.markdownDescription: Whether to *also* notify you when your stable Rust version is up to date (sends out a notification that your stable Rust version is up to date). The default is to only notify you when there is an update available.

rustup-reminder.UpdateWhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to automatically update your stable Rust version when an update is available. This is done by running 'rustup update -- stable' (updates the stable version and potentially rustup itself).

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
